attributes.action: Waive fee for employees of the NHS who desire UK citizenship
attributes.additional_details: Non-UK employees of the NHS have worked hard, with compassion and facing personal risk, to support the UK population during the Covid-19 pandemic. Without their tireless support, healthcare in the UK would be overwhelmed. They have earned our respect and if they desire to remain and contribute to the UK then the financial barriers to them doing so should be waived.
attributes.background: Waive fee for employees of the NHS making citizenship and right of abode applications.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Waive citizenship application fees for NHS workers and their families: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565015

Allow all non-UK NHS workers to become UK citizens for free: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564829

Extend rights to Indefinite Leave to Remain for non-UK NHS workers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564809
